title: Minecraft Ambient Sounds
description: Sets the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Ambient Sounds
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

fields.title: Addition
fields.description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position

fields.title: Loop
fields.description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome

fields.title: Mood
fields.description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby air block position when the light level is low. Biomes without an ambient mood sound will use the 'ambient.cave' sound.
